title: klara1554
author: klara1554
created_time: February 11, 2023, 09:26:30 AMLast edit: February 15, 2023, 01:14:23 PM by klara1554
content: Hello, I want to share my bad experience with online casino cbet.gg. I created account there, verified it first, then i made deposit of 744usdt, after some gambling i won there on sportsbetting and made withdrawal of 966usdt which was successful, it made me belive site is legit so i gambled some more, successfully withdrawed 870usd more and after that they blocked my account for no reason with 3600usdt on it and said i violated their terms and conditions (which i didnt) when i asked how did i violated it they didnt answer. When i asked how can i withdraw my money, they said i cant because i violated their tac. They blocked my access to livechat and dont respond to my emails.They have thousands of fake reviews on trustpilot https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.cbet.gg so if you have bad experience with this casino, write them review please.If anyone have same experience, feel free to contact me so we can contact their licence provider.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: klara1554 on February 11, 2023, 09:26:30 AMI want to share my bad experience with online casino cbet.gg. If they have a forum profile then it's better to PM them and discuss about it. This way they will know that the case exists.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: This is really bad and I can also relate with how bad you could be feeling now and just as the previous user has already said, I think it will be more better you try to contact their team over here on the forum if they have any profile or representative over here.And I think you should also provide more of proves and evidence to the things you said because this things has also become a thread with some new casinos blocking users for no definite reason possibly because they're lucky with their gaming and maybe making more of profit and the next thing is for the casino to block their account and tag them rile breakers even without pointing out what rule they actually broke. It will be wise you guys report to their licence off.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I checked Trustpilot and go for only the 1 star reviews which are bad reviews, it started from October 27th, 2022 and most were in 2023. Probably the site has gone bad and you should not use the site again. These are the negative reviews:https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.cbet.gg?stars=1

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I am sorry for your loss OP but I don't remember how many times we have said here to never play in casinos that do not have a positive ANN thread here,filled with only good reviews,instant withdrawals and a lot of promotions going on to keep their gamblers happy.Only few casinos here fulfill all those conditions and only them are the ones which most of us recommend to play at,these casinos offer anything that most likely it was offered to you at that scam site and even more so again sorry that you learned this the hard way but that's life.

comments.author: donationsxp
comments.created_time: February 11, 2023, 12:44:10 PMLast edit: February 11, 2023, 12:56:41 PM by donationsxp
comments.body: This site has 70k reviews is more than all the casinos together. Is. clear that he buys reviews. The biggest casino dont have near that: Stake only has 2kBc.game 913GG poker 1.2kRoobet 997 Is one of the things you need to check when you play the review ratio and their traffic.  All the sites above our biggers than the Cbet.gg

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: i see trustpilot a lot of reviews say SCAM , whether that is true or not i have never heard of this casino on the forums or i missed it but you should contact them through their service support or if there is their casino ANN thread on this forum you can contact them directly

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: There's a lot of bad reviews with that site, too bad you didn't check their reputation before trying their platform.Probably they allow you to withdraw at first so you can trust them, I don't know but if the site is legit they should tell the reason on banning you.Other players might also experiencing the same problem but not here in the forum, I didn't see any announcement thread with regards to this site. You got scammed, and it will be hard to get it back if their business is to scam the gamblers, this is a lesson learned do your review first before trusting the site and also don't store too much money on any site, its not safe at all.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Bitcointalk is already saturated with same complaint on casino that offers sportsbook. It’s just odd that these guy usually have same which they deposit then win multiple times consecutively on SPORTSBOOK then casino freeze their account after they manage to withdraw some of their profit.I don’t know exactly what’s the real story behind this kind of issue but Arbitrage betting is already now common crypto sportsbook which is same problem on fiat sportsbook. I believe these arbitrage guys migrate already on crypto casino from fiat casino after being banned already on fiat casino. I joined many subreddit group about this arbitrage betting and most of them shares same story with OP. I believe they are being bust because bookmaker has records of all the players detail in different casino.I hope Bitcointalk will not become a tool for this arbitrage guys as reason to pressure casino to release their funds. Arbitrage bets is not allowed on any sportsbook.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: -   Most of the reviews on Trustpilot are positive, but when it comes to negative reviews, they have the same issue and complaint, and that is the sudden blocking of their accounts. It's also quite sad and worrying for a gambler's side.Think about it, you will be bitten at the beginning that you won and you will be allowed to withdraw first and second then all of a sudden suddenly when they see that you have deposited a large amount suddenly you can't access your account because it is blocked without any opposition.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: a few days ago I've read about someone's statement saying that on TrustPilot scam casinos can buy fake positive reviews, that's very sad.after I opened the trustpilot site that was shared by the OP it turned out that it was true that the casino had a high rating and had lots of reviews there. but from the many reviews, I have a little suspicion that they are just fake positive reviews bought by the casino so that the business looks fine to use for gambling.and for the OP, I read your story about the first deposit and withdrawal it's fine, after you use bigger money you are banned, can you provide a little screenshot for us to see together here.even though we here cannot help taking your money from the casino, at least your evidence can help other people to be careful not to bet large amounts there.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: apparently this is a scam casino, and something that shocks me is that they have complaints but these casino monitor sites do not put this casino on the list of scam casinos, for example:https://www.askgamblers.com/online-casinos/reviews/cbet-casinoeven though they have more negative comments, these damn casino.guru do not put this casino on the scam list because the casino continues to pay them, these guys are low-level people, they are disgusting, they are making money at the expense of other people's lossthese guys from this site:https://www.askgamblers.com/online-casinos/reviews/cbet-casinothey are also worthless, these are others who make money at the expense of other people's losses

There seems to be no difference with 1xbit, isn't there a lot of this too? This casino should be flagged in the crypto space.

comments.author: virasisog
comments.body: Quote from: donationsxp on February 11, 2023, 12:44:10 PMThis site has 70k reviews is more than all the casinos together. Is. clear that he buys reviews. The biggest casino dont have near that: Stake only has 2kBc.game 913GG poker 1.2kRoobet 997 Is one of the things you need to check when you play the review ratio and their traffic.  All the sites above our biggers than the Cbet.ggIt's obvious that they are buying reviews so their site would look legit and trusted. That's the reason why reading reviews and feedback is not enough to determine the trust rate of a casino. It will be better to check their ANN thread rather tham reading their fake reviews. I'm sorry for what happened to you, Op but it seems like the site has scammed you. There are still other casinos that you should trust especially those that have a strong foundation of legit trust so just be careful next time.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: klara1554 on February 11, 2023, 09:26:30 AMThey have thousands of fake reviews on trustpilot https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.cbet.gg so if you have bad experience with this casino, write them review please.Why did you check their trust feedback in trustpilot first before depositing and gambling in the site? Next time don't gamble in any casino you see online or passerby casino with ads. If you must do make sure you verify it very well before giving yourself go ahead. As Royse777 has said, if there Rep. in the forum dm him then he will communicate with his representative. But before you do that you to provide you evidences so that the case can be settled without delay. Have a nice case.

Too late for this, OP should visit that review site first before making any huge deposit. This site is a scam, and better to avoid it at all cost. OP still managed to withdraw some funds and i don’t know if the scammed money is a new deposit or came from a profit. Anyway, regardless of its source its already gone, and it will be hard to recover because the site is not responding and they have no plan to resolve all the issues on their platform.

comments.author: usekevin
comments.body: It should avoid such gambling site to escape from the further scam.Most of the people was not aware of Bitcointalk and use the google to get some knowledge before investing.But sometimes google was making the update few days after the normal news.After many people reported,they will start to do background verification and make a statement.But the forum is quite faster then google in gambling most of the times.The new gamblers use the forum to get the most frequent updates about the gambling sites and to inverse the money on correct websites.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I visited their trustpilot page and read through a good number of the reviews there, I believe op is right, a greater number of the reviews there are fake, this site is indeed a scam, but still wonder how op fell victim when he already saw all the warning from other user of this site, that most of the reviews are fake, this should have been enough reason to stay away.Anyways, sorry about your loss and thank you for warning this community, unfortunately, this casino is not listed on this forum, so nothing much can be done other than to avoid ever playing there.
